name: Pirate Jammers
description:
Two-player ship racing game. Made for Winnitron during game jam, theme was Land & Sea.

Keyboard controls (Winnitron version)

Player 1 - Red

Switch ships - Z X

Movement - WASD or arrow keys

Player 2 - Blue

Switch ships - N M

Movement - IJKL

Joystick controls

Uh, joystick and two buttons. Which two, depends on the layout of your joystick.
